channel.title: Automated donation rewards
channel.description:
i need help with this, i would like it when some1 donates they receive a pin code and enter it on my server and they get there donation reward... like on paradise-scape's command "claim" can some1 explain or show how to do this(ive got website, webhosting, paypal, mysql, sql, anything that would be needed to make this happen and im sure alot of rsps owners would like to know how to do this
moderator if you have any time on ur schedule please sticky this

item.dc:creator: @fly341 fly341
item.description:
@fly341 wrote:

uh thanks i thank. Can you show me how not from the very begining, but a tutorial related to my via topic?
